references.reason: This paper is foundational for diffusion models, introducing the core concept of denoising diffusion for generative modeling.
This paper significantly improves upon the original diffusion model, enhancing its performance and efficiency.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the state-of-the-art in text-to-image generation using diffusion models, showcasing high-quality results.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces significant improvements to the resolution and quality of images generated by diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper provides a strong theoretical foundation for score-based generative modeling, which underpins many advances in diffusion models.
